TEXT.TITLE: KING WORLD <KWP> BEGINS STOCK REPURCHASE
TEXT.BODY: King World Productions Inc said it began an open market repurchase program of its shares on October 19. King World said the total number of shares ultimately bouught back will depend on prevailing market conditions including interst rates, the price of the shares and possible diversification opportunities. Reuter
